# AI Agent Study

> Comprehensive tutorials for building production-ready AI agents with Claude. Learn ReAct, Plan-Execute-Verify, and Human-in-the-Loop patterns through practical examples. Bilingual documentation in English and Traditional Chinese.

This site provides hands-on tutorials for building autonomous AI agents that can reason, plan, and execute complex tasks. Each pattern includes complete, runnable code examples in Python with implementations using Claude SDK, model-agnostic approaches, and LangChain integration. All tutorials use a real-world legal document review system as a case study.

**Key Learning Paths:**
- **ReAct Pattern**: Simple single-loop reasoning agent (~400 lines, 2-3 hours, beginner-friendly)
- **Plan-Execute-Verify**: Production-grade multi-phase architecture (~1300+ lines, 6-8 hours, advanced)
- **Human-in-the-Loop**: Interactive agent patterns with user input workflows

**Technologies:** Python 3.10+, Claude API, Anthropic SDK, LangChain, async programming

## Core Tutorials

- [Getting Started](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/): Landing page with learning paths and prerequisites
- [Case Study: Legal Document Review](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/case-study/): Real-world example comparing agent patterns for automated legal document analysis

## ReAct Pattern (Beginner)

- [Overview](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/react/01-overview/): Architecture diagrams and pattern explanation with Mermaid flowcharts
- [Claude Implementation](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/react/02-claude-implementation/): Complete implementation using Anthropic SDK with tool calling
- [Multi-Provider Implementation](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/react/03-multi-provider/): Build agents that work across Claude, GPT, Gemini using LangChain (recommended) or manual abstraction patterns, with latest LangChain 1.2.8 and LangGraph integration

## Plan-Execute-Verify Pattern (Production)

- [Overview](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/plan-execute-verify/01-overview/): Multi-phase architecture with state machines and verification
- [Claude Implementation](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/plan-execute-verify/02-claude-implementation/): Production-ready implementation with error recovery
- [Multi-Provider Implementation](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/plan-execute-verify/03-multi-provider/): Build PEV agents that work across Claude, GPT, Gemini using LangChain/LangGraph (recommended) or manual abstraction patterns, with latest 2026 frameworks

## Human-in-the-Loop Pattern

- [Introduction](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/human-in-the-loop/00-index/): Overview of interactive agent workflows
- [Pattern Overview](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/human-in-the-loop/01-overview/): Architecture and user interaction design
- [Claude Implementation](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/human-in-the-loop/02-claude-implementation/): Interactive agents with approval workflows
- [OpenAI Implementation](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/human-in-the-loop/03-openai-implementation/): Human-in-the-loop using OpenAI SDK
- [Model-Agnostic Version](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/human-in-the-loop/04-model-agnostic/): Universal implementation pattern

## Traditional Chinese (繁體中文)

- [案例研究：法律文件審查系統](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/zh-tw/case-study/): Case study in Traditional Chinese
- [Human-in-the-Loop 介紹](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/zh-tw/human-in-the-loop/00-index/): Human-in-the-loop tutorials in Traditional Chinese
- [模式概述](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/zh-tw/human-in-the-loop/01-overview/): Pattern overview in Traditional Chinese
- [Claude 實作](https://schwanndenkuo.github.io/ai-agent-study/zh-tw/human-in-the-loop/02-claude-implementation/): Claude implementation in Traditional Chinese

## Optional

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/schwanndenkuo/ai-agent-study): Source code and issue tracking
- [Anthropic API Documentation](https://docs.anthropic.com/): Official Claude API documentation
- [Claude Tool Use Guide](https://docs.anthropic.com/en/docs/build-with-claude/tool-use): Tool calling and function execution reference
